meanings.definition: Showing signs of wear and age; shabby or dirty.
meanings.sent1: The old, dingiest shirt had holes and stains all over it.
meanings.sent2: The dingiest room in the house was the neglected attic.
meanings.sent3: Even the cat refused to sleep on the dingiest rug in the house.
meanings.sent4: Her smile brightened even the dingiest of days.
meanings.sent5: The dingiest corner of the park was where the forgotten toys gathered.
